News.headline: Hospitality Available Against Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.page_title: Hospitality Available Against Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.URL_keywords: Hospitality Available Against Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.short_description: This New Year sees the Daggers take on Braintree Town in the second game of the Christmas and New Year double header, and you can enjoy the game with our fantastic hospitality experience.
News.description:
Don’t miss out with one of the following available packages to start the New Year off in style at our Live BT Sport game on the 2nd January 2017:

Matchday Hospitality

Matchday Hospitality is a great way to celebrate a special event, or bring a party to the game and includes:

•    Three course meal
•    Seat in the Sponsors Box
•    Half time refreshments
•    Complimentary matchday programme and team sheet

This is priced at just £65 inc VAT per person

Executive Box Hire

Our Executive Box Packages remains available for the match, so why not watch the game in style. The package includes:
 
•    Private Hospitality box for up to 12 guests
•    Three course meal
•    Complimentary matchday programmes and teamsheets
•    Fully equipped with SKY TV and minibar with waitress service
•    Access to the Sponsors Lounge
 
This fantastic package is available for just £850 + VAT, and is ideal a business to entertain its clients or  reward staff, or for supporters to celebrate a big occasion with a special day out.
 
To avoid disappointment, book by 12pm Tuesday 27th December by contacting the commercial department at commerical@daggers.co.uk or call 07557921858

Please note this game is an evening game with Kick-off at 7:45pm, so the hospitality lounge will be open from 6pm.
